### How to Index String Fields For Faceted Search
The `stringFacet` type can be used to index [string](https://www.mongodb.com/docs/manual/reference/bson-types/#string) fields for faceting, which allows you to run a facet query on that field. Atlas Search doesn't apply the analyzer when indexing `string` fields for faceting.

Atlas Search only supports [facet](https://www.mongodb.com/docs/atlas/atlas-search/facet/#std-label-fts-facet-ref) queries against fields indexed as the `stringFacet` type. To perform a normal search also on the same field, you must index the field as type `string` also.
type.description: Specify this data type for indexing fields of type string for faceting.
